en: Sorry, come on so we can leave now.
The inside of the house is not good.
Take, you put in the house.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gÿo pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ kÿò ngyaŋa.
en: I do it in spite of myself.

ngiemboon: À tsẅǐ le múɔ ngie à gʉa sɔg mekáŋ tsɛ̀ɛ tekwòŋ nkwoŋ.
en: He asked the child to go and wash the dishes.

ngiemboon: Á té poŋo légiŋe pǐ tsɛ̀ɛtsẅɛ́ʼ wɔ́.
en: It is not good to walk outside at midnight.

ngiemboon: Mé ée těen ńtúŋe mpfó tsɛ̀ɛzsǒ wɔ́.
en: We don't bury the dead at noon.
Wash the dust from the bottom of the plate well.
Door, you put under the chair.
Place this plate under the chair.

ngiemboon: Gʉa tsìŋɔɔn ńtúʼ ntse ńdɔg ńtó.
en: Go downstairs to get some water to bring.
